Class RequestMessage

java.lang.Object
  Message
      RequestMessage

public class RequestMessage
extends Message

Representation of a REQUEST message from a Peer. A Request message is defined as follows, by the BitTorrent Protocol: request: The request message is fixed length, and is used to request a block. The payload contains the following information: - index: integer specifying the zero-based piece index - begin: integer specifying the zero-based byte offset within the piece - length: integer specifying the requested length.
